snippet: The referendum itself contains only one question, but it gives rise to many others: What is at stake? What would become of the Union Jack? What would a disunited kingdom be called?
lead_paragraph: The referendum itself contains only one question, but it gives rise to many others: What is at stake? What would become of the Union Jack? What would a disunited kingdom be called?

headline.main: Many Questions Arise From Scottish Independence Vote

keywords.value: Elizabeth II, Queen of Great Britain
keywords.name: persons
